messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]TV Voluntarily Off/positives of TV
messages.msgSnippet: **I ve been writing a response to her review about the positives of TV.** Would you let us read it when you re done? I m always looking for writings on this
messages.messageBody:
**I've been writing a response to her review about the positives of TV.**

Would you let us read it when you're done?

I'm always looking for writings on this sort of thing. Ammunition you know!

Kelli~

Yeah, sure!

Julie

From: Julie Solich
